about.headline: MANKA RIDER'S
about.p1: Our adventure began when we decided to show how incredible it is to ride Chacas by bike. Since then, the Manka Rider's community has dedicated itself to sharing our passion with everyone who wants to experience the thrill of pedaling through this beautiful place.
about.p2: Our team consists of local cyclists who know every corner of the city and are ready to offer you a unique adrenaline-filled experience. With us, you will live Chacas in a special way, enjoying its beauty and energy on every ride.

sponsors.editorial_p1: We invite you to be part of a project with the potential to transform lives and put Chacas on the international cycling map. With your support, we will take this sport to new generations, promoting values such as discipline and personal improvement.

events.title: CHRONICLES
events.subtitle: A living archive of glory, mud and adrenaline in the peaks of Chacas.

data.desc: We want to take advantage of the characteristic rains of this season to add a unique and exciting challenge that raises the adrenaline of the participants and puts their dexterity to the test. This event will not be just a competition, but an unforgettable experience that combines nature, excitement and the adventurous spirit that defines our riders.

The second competition was a true challenge reserved only for the most daring. The route through the forest surprised with ramps and natural drops that tested the technique and courage of each cyclist. But the maximum explosion of adrenaline came with the final jump towards the Plaza de Armas: higher, longer and more impactful than in the first edition.

The first competition stood out for being a true challenge for the most daring. One of the main factors that increased the difficulty was the intense rain, which turned the track into extremely slippery terrain. This not only complicated the climbs with the trucks, but also tested the control and skill of the riders when maneuvering their bikes.

discover.p1: Chacas, in the Ancash region of Peru, is a unique destination that invites you to immerse yourself in nature at its purest, surrounded by towering mountains, deep valleys, and dazzling landscapes. It is the perfect place for adventurers; just a few kilometers away lies the Huascarán National Park, where the majestic Huascarán peak and nearby mountains further embellish our city.
discover.p2: Moreover, Chacas stands out for its charming colonial architecture, its rich cultural heritage, and the warmth of its people, making every visit a memorable experience. And for the most intrepid, we organize exciting bike routes where you can explore secret paths and discover the most amazing corners of our fascinating community. Come live the adventure and tradition of Chacas like never before!
